sourcesContent:
import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-blog-list', templateUrl: './blog-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./blog-list.component.css'] }) export class BlogListComponent implements OnInit{ articles:any; baseUrl:any="http://127.0.0.1:3000/uploads/"; constructor(private data:DataService){ } ngOnInit(): void { this.data.getAll().subscribe((data)=>{ this.articles = data; },(err)=>{ console.log(err); }); } }
